summary: The video showcases various travel destinations where the creator is holding a camera, appearing to take photos. The text overlays offer reflections on photography, stating "photography is a way of feeling," "of touching," "of loving," and "what you have caught on film is captured forever. It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything."
transcript: photography is a way of feeling. of touching, of loving, what you have caught on film is captured forever. It remembers little things, long after you have forgotten everything.
